Detailed Description

Extended Kalman filter (EKF) for Ackermann vehicle.

◆ control_acceleration_gain_

double ackermann_ekf::AckermannEkf::control_acceleration_gain_
private

In predicting acceleration from control velocity, this is the gain related to velocity error.

double ackermann_ekf::AckermannEkf::control_angle_speed_gain_
private

In predicting steering angle velocity from control steering angle, this is the gain related to steering angle error.

Definition at line 304 of file ackermann_ekf.h.

◆ max_control_acceleration_

double ackermann_ekf::AckermannEkf::max_control_acceleration_
private

In predicting acceleration from control velocity, this is the maximum allowed acceleration: Accelerations above (or below the negated value) will be clamped to this value.

Definition at line 322 of file ackermann_ekf.h.

◆ max_control_angle_speed_

double ackermann_ekf::AckermannEkf::max_control_angle_speed_
private

In predicting steering angle velocity from control steering angle, this is the maximum allowed steering angle velocity: Velocities above (or below the negated value) will be clamped to this value.
